mapper.select: select iboard, icategory,title,created_at createdat,board_view boardview from board where iuser = #{iuser} and del_yn = 1

SELECT A.iboard, A.icategory, B.name, A.title, A.ctnt, A.created_at AS createdat, A.board_view AS boardview FROM board A INNER JOIN user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.del_yn = 1 and A.title != '' ORDER BY A.icategory = 1 DESC, A.iboard DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
select count(iboard) from board where title != ''
SELECT COUNT(A.iboard) FROM ( SELECT x.iboard FROM board x INNER JOIN user y ON x.iuser = y.iuser WHERE x.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND x.del_yn = 1 ) A

select A.iboard,A.icategory,B.name,A.title,A.ctnt,A.created_at createdat,A.board_view boardview from board A inner join user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.icategory=#{icategory} order by A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}

select A.iboard,C.icategory, C.name category, A.title, B.name, A.created_at createdat, A.board_view boardview from board A inner join user B on A.iuser = B.iuser inner join board_category C on A.icategory = C.icategory where A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and A.del_yn = 1 and title !='' order by A.icategory asc,A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}

SELECT A.iboard,A.iuser,C.name, D.name category, A.title, A.ctnt, A.created_at createdat,A.board_view boardview FROM board A LEFT JOIN user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser LEFT JOIN board_category D ON A.icategory = D.icategory WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_image WHERE iboardpic = #{iboardpic} AND iboard IN (SELECT iboard FROM board WHERE iboard = #{iboard})
mapper.select: SELECT A.pic FROM board_image A LEFT JOIN board B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard} AND B.iuser = #{iuser}
